document_data.name: Sarcelle Malinosh
document_data.mainbody: '''Sarcelle Malinosh''' was a [[Neverwintian]] [[noble]] and [[wild magic]] [[sorcerer]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]]. She lost the ability to conjure [[magic]] during an expedition to a distant [[plane]].
document_data.Description: Sarcelle's responses to questions were very cryptic, almost like predictions. Nevertheless, she strove to manage this habit, aware of how irritating it was.
document_data.History: In the late [[1490 DR|1490s DR]],{{Vecna-time}} Sarcelle and other three nobles were kidnapped by group of [[Vecna]] cultists and taken to [[Neverwinter]]'s graveyard, [[Neverdeath]]. She was then confined in a crypt that had been converted into a cell.
